root.str: Capture 3 Resources on 艾美瑞什
Allows use of the mid-range 3.4x V3 Holographic scope.

Electrical Storms no longer drain your personal shield, and lightning damage is reduced by 50%.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Visit the waypoint area on your map and use the Signal Scanner to help you locate hidden data caches.

No longer appeased by technological advances, the empires clash once more! Facilitator Campner of Nanite Systems positions their Operatives to end the conflict. Do what you must to aid your faction in the conquest of Esamir so that they might uncover the truth buried benath the warpgate.

• Rewards are granted during the Playoff and Championship rounds.
  • Rewards are delivered once your outfit's official rank is determined (at the end of the match).
I'm a little banged up doc.
Advanced targeting system can lock-on to air and ground vehicles
The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. All factions can use NS weapons.
Calibrated for accuracy, the Scorpius VA75 is able to hit targets reliably that other SMGs would miss.
Apply the Indar Plateau camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.

The Halloween Event has begun! Logging in has granted you this free mask which can be worn throughout the event for a bonus 10% xp! Start collecting pumpkin seeds now to earn Halloween helmets that you can wear through the year!
The TR brass thinks you're overdue for an upgrade to that standard issue armor! Act now for a deep discount on a variety of composite helmets and armors!
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> Transfer complete. We can begin once the Signal Scanner has been equipped into your tactical slot.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Stamp out our enemies while they're near those mining drills. Fish in a barrel.
Spawn an Aircraft from a Warpgate Aircraft Terminal on Esamir
Apply the Abstract Circle camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Use consoles in Indar, Esamir, Hossin, and 艾美瑞什.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 7%.
Reduces the amount of damage received from explosions by 10%
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Apply the single use India Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the Abstract Circle camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Enemy players do not have any indicators above them unless they are spotted.
You must be leading a Squad or Platoon to issue orders.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Operative. We've added a new blueprint to your Advanced Nanite Transport vehicle's terminal, an Elysium Refinery.
<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Congratulations, FL-34! Download complete... I will now self-destruct.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
Kill bounty targets with a sniper rifle.
Kill a player with an infantry explosive

Did you spend Certs on skills and you wish you hadn't?
Now is your ONLY chance to REFUND cert points you've spent.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Calculating Voice Pack. NC Female use only.
You have been removed from the vehicle queue because [*reason*].

<font color="#00FFAA">Sergeant Reese:</font> Be sure to apply some facepaint or wear a mask during the celebration. It helps add to the experience. And hey, if we all do it, then none of us look silly.
Retrieve data uplink device from allied terminal.
Apply the Carbon Fiber camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
The NS-11P is a platinum variant of the NS-11A. Its large, rapid-reload magazine and high-velocity cartridges complement its variety of attachments. All factions can use NS weapons.
That region is under our control, but not for long if we don't defend it. Deploy there now.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 720 rounds.
The rumblings of Steel Rain can be heard overhead.
VS - Shared - Heavy Pistol - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)

<font color="#00FFAA">Nalla:</font> In addition to the departure signs posted throughout Sanctuary, everyone on the operation is provided a personal datapad to track and display how your efforts impact our progress on the path to Oshur.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%, and infantry rockets by 20%.
Your targeting dart entered a no deploy area and has been destroyed.
Vehicles can take a lot of damage before being destroyed. Use explosive ordnance and stay close to cover when attacking them.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.
艾美瑞什 Leaf - Single Use
Drive the Sunderer towards your personal waypoint.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
Allows the Infiltrator to use IFF Grenades which are capable of detecting enemy troops within its scanning radius.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Harasser to 7 minutes.
A full complement of Purple Snowflake Lumifibers at a discounted rate. VS use only.
Adds 1 round to the default magazine size.
RNGTEK's Lx6 scope gives soldiers precision shots at long engagement ranges.
Use and then fully regenerate your jump jets

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.25 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 174 meters and reduces detection from enemy Engagement Radars by 100 meters.
Apply the single use Jungle Forest camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Welcome to Planetside 2! This training program will guide you through many of the game's basics, and walk you through a battlefield simulation on the planet Auraxis.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Collect data fragments from enemy Bio Labs consoles
Adds the Combustion Intake to the Galaxy. VS use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Liberator to 7 minutes.
Error: Mentor squads cannot merge with other squads.
You do not have permission to craft [*asset*].
Contains several decals that can be applied to your armor, vehicle, or outfit. All factions can use these items.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
The Buzzard converts the flash into a makeshift artillery platform, using heavy high explosive shells with a large blast radius. NC use only.
Increases the performance of your turbo by 1% over the previous version.
Adds 50 rounds to the default magazine size.
Slows and disorients enemies within its blast radius

Designed for raw power, the Decimator is unmatched in its destructive potential against enemy vehicles and infantry. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.
While in contested territory, absorb 2500 damage using the Seraph Shield.
It's expensive, but that's kind of the point. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 13.125%
Beyond that, continue assisting with combat operations in an effort to return the Empire balance to normalcy.

No longer appeased by the stumbling technological advances of Nanite Systems, Warden Hadley of the New Conglomerate makes a daring maneuver to discover the truth. Conquer the continent of Esamir and uncover the truth buried benath the warpgate.
Check to see what's on sale today!
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> That's enough hacking for now. Report back to Foster on Sanctuary for your next mission.

A late successor to the Quasar VM1, the Cosmos uses experimental plasma containment technology, resulting in larger rounds. These large plasma rounds cause less cranial trauma, but are significantly easier to strike mobile targets with. VS use only.
VS - Heavy Pistol - Mid - V2 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the Idle Timer on the Prowler to 24 minutes.

Distribution of new insulated armor and equipment begins, easing the hardships of Esamir's frigid wastes, but not before the land itself begins to shudder with more instability. It has become increasingly clear that there is something broken beneath the surface of the planet, and the energies held therin will only bubble to the surface in more destructive ways. Nanite Systems continues working to defuse burgeoning disaster.
Aiming down the sights of your weapon will greatly improve accuracy but penalize your movement.
Items Only Found in the Heroic Boost Bundle!
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 2.67% every 1 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Flail does not have AI Module and cannot fire.
Reduces the resource cost of acquiring this vehicle by an additional 15% [WIP]
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
The AR-101 was quick to follow its predecessor's design, with modest modifications that include additional stopping power and controllability at cost to rate of fire. NSO use only.
Always keep moving. A stationary target is often a dead target.
Adds 1 grenade to the default magazine size.

Trades 25 Synthium for 2 Polystellarite.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a PS1 Gold Hood Ornament.

LOYALTY
Capture and defend bases with your outfit to earn Loyalty. Gain Loyalty to increase your Loyalty Rank and access better rewards from the Outfit Vendor in Sanctuary. Loyalty decays slowly with long periods of absence.

MERIT
Capture and defend bases with your outfit to earn Merit. Spend Merit at the Outfit Vendor in Sanctuary to purchase boosts, utilities, decals, and other cosmetics.
Max 20,000.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Apply the single use Indar Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Kills while wielding a sidearm increase reload speed by 17% for 2.25 seconds.
The LA8 Rebel's high damage gives it a longer effective range when compared to most side arms. NC use only.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 70 rounds.
The Air to Ground Missiles are ideal for engaging ground targets
Increases the Idle Timer on the Harasser to 13 minutes.
Apply the African Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Snow Aspen Forest camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Head for a Warp Gate Terminal if you'd like to leave the Koltyr training continent.
The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> This is the garage of the newly constructed Containment Site. Defending the facility becomes considerably more difficult if enemy vehicles are able to breach this location.
Allows cortium to be used to create a banner displaying your faction logo.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 40 meters the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Reduces damage taken by indirect AOE hits for 24 hours. Rank 32 required.

Orion's largest star also shines brightly as a powerful, accurate LMG capable of sustained suppressing fire. Plagued by multiple redesigns during its troubled development, the third and final iteration proved itself as a favorite amongst the VS.
Adds the Combustion Intake to the Galaxy. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 54 rounds.

Of course you know, this means war!
+20% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the April Fools event.
Apply the Honeycomb camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Apply the Starburst camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Various Modules can be placed near player-made construction objects to modify their defenses, repair them over time, generate shields, or automate turrets!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 21.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
Scout Radar has a 250 meter range.
The New Conglomerate has taken Saurva!
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Allows use of the long range 8x OPS sniper scope.
Provides little protection from projectiles, but absorbs an incredible amount of force generated from anti-personnel mines

Genudine Dynamic's flexible Hawk rocket launcher can lock onto enemy aircraft, as well as be dumbfired against enemy armor or infantry. NC use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Optional Lockon: Aircraft</font>
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Join an outfit to work together as a larger team. Outfit members can be identified by a tag in their names. Outfits are a great way to meet experienced players.
A 4x zoom laser scope useful when engaging targets at greater distances.
VS Light Assault Personal Shield Rank 1
Apply the Woodland camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Wearable by Combat Medic. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 bombs.

Headshot kills grant 35% faster weapon rechamber speed for 3 seconds; chaining headshots can store a maximum of 5 seconds worth of rechamber speed.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with Sniper Rifles.</font>
Adds a touch of convenience to your rolling war machine. All factions can use this gear.
The Dogma SX11's compact package disguises the incredible lethality of the Vanu Sovereignty's deadliest pistol.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
The invitation to join [*guild*] has been revoked.
Failed to remove the squad from the platoon.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 25 meters.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Signal Scanner relay successfully deployed. Advance to the next area and continue to use the tool to find the next survey location.
Reduces damage taken from some explosions and most types of machine guns.
Reduces damage taken from small arms, heavy machine guns, and gatling guns by 20%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> You have found the researcher. She does not look well. You should see what you can learn while you still can.
Unlock specialized grenades for the Engineer. Grenades can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 630 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Use any SMG to kill enemies as a Light Assault.
Gold Venril Sathir Bust Hood Ornament
It's real cool of you. Real cool.
You are already tracking the maximum allowed number of directives.
Error deleting credit card, please try again later!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rockets.
You have been removed from the outfit.
Unlock various gadgets for the Galaxy's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Instantly restores Magrider's energy to full, and breaks lockon attempts in the process. Can be used once every 25 seconds.
The 6x magnified S3 comes standard on many Terran sniper rifles. Its moderate zoom level and mil-dot sighting makes it perfect for mid-to-long range combat.
Your Lightning Grenade was absorbed by a Lightning Arrester.
Apply the Indar Highlands v1 camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
You receive a discount as a Member!
Defend the Shield Console in the Medical Wing

Replaces 20% of the Vanguard's health with a fast regenerating shield layer. This shield has a 6 second recharge delay upon receiving damage, and a 11 second delay when broken. Regenerates 100 shield health per second.
Increases the overall handling of the Sunderer by 15%.
When activated, the Sunderer is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields. Lasts 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.
You must rejoin the [*channel*] channel before speaking in it. /joinchannel for more information.
Use to get through tight spaces, duck behind cover, or increase accuracy.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 563 rounds.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
<font color="#00FFAA">PRIORITY MISSION</font> Destroy aircraft near an Anomaly
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> You gather some combat data for me, and I'll get you something real nice like. How 'bout it?
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Esamir sure has been through a lot. Take a look at the nearest friendly Containment Site.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 350 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> No matter, once the fighting subsides on Esamir, I'll send a team to analyze the crater more thoroughly. If you can expedite this process, it would be appreciated.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%; and infantry rockets, light anti-vehicle, and air-to-ground explosives by 20%.
Orbital Strike Uplink owner has been offline for 10 minutes and was automatically deconstructed

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Stories? Sure, what soldier worth his salt doesn't have a tale or twenty to tell. If you want one that was written down then I'm going to need something in return. Grab your toolbox and spend some time reinforcing and resupplying the front line.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Looks like we've got all of the keys. Now comes the fun part.
<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Update, JustHere4Memes. Download currently 70% complete. Continue to prevent interruptions.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Manned bastion point defense weapons intended to defend the bastion from aircraft.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 90 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Hey boyo, you made it! That was quite a thing you did with the robot body and the downloading and the lightning and stuff. Ain't science grand?
Paying others to do the dirty work, eh? I respect the pragmatism, but this next task you'll need to complete on your own.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 13 shells.
Is this the best you have?
Make your presence known with this horn from Nanite Systems. VS use only.
Apply the single use Woodland camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Good, enlightened one. The origin of the transmission should be nearby. Use the primary fire of your Signal Scanner to determine your distance from the target.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Adequate performance, operative. I have been informated that your reward has been delivered.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, can resupply the ammunition of ground vehicles in its vicinity. VS only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Ayla:</font> You'll be pleased to know that I was able to retrieve the checkers set that you requested. Let me know who it's for and I can have it gift-wrapped for you.
The LAV-LA can lock onto aircraft at moderate distances, allowing it to fire a homing missile. It may also be dumbfired without a lock when needed. NSO use only.
Further increases the range of the Radar Scrambler
TR MAX Grenade Launcher Placeholder desc
Earn this ribbon by being a Platoon Leader when your other squad leaders earn Squad Leadership ribbons.
The Vanguard is the New Conglomerate's main battle tank. It is a slow tank but has strong armor and a powerful cannon.
Apply the single use Indar Scrub camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
This customization adds a Cyan decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1500 rounds.

The 11AG is the gold high-end variant of the adaptable 11A assault rifle platform. Reliable with a wide assortment of attachments, the 11AG can change itself to excel in nearly any situation. All factions can use NS weapons.
Allows Light Assault to use Smoke Grenades.
Improves the ability of the Lightning to manuever in combat by improving rotation speed, brake power, and reverse speed.
This special decal is given to followers of LevelCap on Twitter or YouTube
A device that when placed will heal friendly soldiers in the immediate area for a period of time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Apply the Cyber Wire camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
The NC6P Gauss SAW features a single shot firing mode for precise, long range shots.
All the cool kids are using them.
Adds violet chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. VS use only.
You have chosen a name that is already taken.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rockets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1013 rounds.

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 116 meters and reduces detection from enemy Engagement Radars by 200 meters.
The room of the clean men
You can accept [*num*] more Daily [*mission*] today
Squad leaders can earn Squad Leadership Ribbons by being near their squad members as they earn squad support experience.
Increases the Idle Timer on the vehicle so that it remains in the game for longer when left unattended. The default time is 5 minutes.
An imposing set of horns for a helmet.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240 rounds.
The New Conglomerate has taken Hvar!
Apply the Arid Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Cyan Chrome camo pattern to your vehicle.
Add some psychological warfare to your Mosquito's strafing runs with this intimidating DiveStrike siren! TR use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Customize your Flash with this orange blinking antenna ball. VS use only.
Apply the Dark Grey camo pattern to your vehicle.
Nanite based tool specialized to repair mechanical systems.
Sunderer Fury extended magazines have been refunded, and replaced with a two-rank version.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 70 rounds.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
Start fighting for real at any time now.
This is an area for UI to play in
Increases the armor value of the front, side, top, and rear quadrants of the Harasser. Also increases resistance to C-4 attacks.
The Aspis Phalanx Turret rapidly fires 20mm shells that create a burst of flak when within proximity of hostile aircraft.
Unlock performance upgrades that change the damping of the vehicle.
Creates a nanite field that regenerates 75 health per second in a 6 meter radius around the Combat Medic.
艾美瑞什: Cap and Hold
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 8%.
The Vanu Sovereignty has taken Tawrich!
When a HIVE becomes active, its location appears on the map for allies AND enemies. Be sure to build up your base defenses BEFORE deploying a HIVE.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades, common explosions, tank mines, and C4 by 50%; and infantry rockets, light anti-vehicle, and air-to-ground explosives by 20%.
This anti-vehicle Phalanx Turret is effective against vehicles. It has unlimited ammunition but builds heat with each shot fired. It can overheat and become inoperable for a short time.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> On top of that you participated in one of the largest scouting efforts in the hunt for structurally sound Containment Sites, grabbed a not-insignificant amount of resources to build the things, and then helped those NS eggheads test out their crackpot weather vanes or whatever.
Apply the Roller Chain camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
NS: Halloween Pumpkin Helmet Desc: Multi Colored Flame
Apply the Plasma camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Burn fuel to increase the Magrider's top speed for up to 1 second. Fuel recharges from zero to full in 15 seconds.
We are unable to load this page right now. Please try again later.
[*target*] already has a pending squad invitation.
Prevent the New Conglomerate from locking Hossin
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
You place a health kit on the ground, healing nearby allies.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%, and infantry rockets by 20%.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Our current goal is to procure enough resources to construct a facility capable of safely dispersing the flow of energy beneath the planet's surface. That's where you come in.
Apply this helmet to your MAX. VS use only.
Adds the Overheat Intake to the Galaxy. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
Adds exhaust stacks to the ANT. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Digital camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

Activate to override the Defector's cooling system regulators turning it into a walking bomb that explodes at the end of 12 seconds. While active, you gain 36% additional armor, lose 10% movement speed, and weapons no longer produce heat. If killed before the countdown is complete, you will be defused.
This controls the maximum number of sounds that can be playing at the same time. A higher value may result in a richer soundscape, but may also decrease performance. (Default 128)
Apply the single use Northern Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Harasser. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 900 seconds.
Adds spectral cosmetic propulsion effects to this vehicle. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
The [*faction*] have the majority of active HIVEs +[*points*] VP!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15rounds.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
Integrated storage cells increase maximum fuel by 40% for most jump jet types. Ambusher Jump Jets regenerate fuel 20% faster.
The Titan-150-R HEAT is loaded with high-explosive anti-tank rounds that reload quickly and have balanced effectiveness against enemy armor and personnel. NC use only.

Participation in mining operations has slowed since the completion of the Containment Sites on Esamir. Nascent Expeditions is actively recruiting soldiers and delivering personal mining devices to improve the rate of Auraxium crystal collection.
Unlocks access to Concussion Grenades. Light Assault only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Vanguard to 18 minutes.
Order of the Dragon Armor Decal
Implants utilize reliable and long-lasting Nanite Systems <font color="#7ff4ff">Power Cores</font> for energy. Remaining energy is displayed on the <font color="#7ff4ff">Implant Energy Reader.</font>
You have no recently completed objectives.
Wearable by all classes. TR use only.
Customize your Flash with this green blinking antenna ball. NC use only.
Single Use California Scrub Armor Camo
Infuses the MAX with unstable energy for up to 18 seconds, increasing maximum damage output by 10% and movement speed slightly, but damage received is increased by 20%.
Kills occasionally increase your accuracy for you and your squad.
Tank Mines are an effective solution to enemy ground vehicles; this certification allows you to carry 2 mines.
Apply the single use Pine Forest camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the Delta camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Comic Book camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 14%, and C-4 damage is reduced by 25%.
You want no piece of this.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 rounds.
WING MOUNT: Photon A2A Missile Pods
The sleek, compact design of the GR-22 improves handling when firing on the move, making it an excellent choice for close quarters combat. NC use only.
Adds the Chrome Outlaw S4 Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Small explosive device that is projected by the user.
The Missile Radar System adds advanced telemetry to track incoming missiles in your vicinity.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50.
Consumes energy to bend light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Lasts for up to 12 seconds and fully recharges over 12 seconds.
Apply the single use Forest Greyscale camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the single use India Scrub camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Headshot kills grant 20% faster weapon rechamber speed for 2 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with sniper rifles.</font>

A clock ticks down on Sanctuary as residents patiently await their return to the long lost islands of Oshur. Prepare your expedition by playing through the new Distant Shores campaign! Unlock faction abilities, cosmetics, and prototype vehicle configurations as you overcome new challenges in the story. New expedition-themed cosmetics, weapons, and profile details are now available in the Depot as we celebrate NINE YEARS of PlanetSide 2!

Thank you for all of your support for these past nine years, and the years to follow!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 70 rounds.
An upgraded version of the successful NC11, the magazine-fed NC14 Bolt Driver is common on the battlefield due to its versatility and high stopping power. NC use only.
And One To Grow On Armor Decal
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 330 rounds.
Armor decal awarded to Cobalt, champions of ServerSmash 2014!
Terrify your enemies with this Ghostly Shriek Horn. All factions can use this gear.
Apply this helmet to your MAX. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.

Trades 200 Auraxium for 22 Synthium.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.
Opponents will look to the sky in fear when they hear the tune to Ride of the Valkyries. All factions can use this gear.
